findings.message:
Reentrancy in Bridge.depositETH(uint8,bytes32,bytes) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1160-1187):
	External calls:
	- wtokenAddress = IERCHandler(handler)._wtokenAddress() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1175)
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).deposit{value: value}() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1177)
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).transfer(address(handler),value) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1178)
	External calls sending eth:
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).deposit{value: value}() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1177)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- depositNonce = ++ _depositCounts[destinationChainID] (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1180)
	- _depositRecords[depositNonce][destinationChainID] = data (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1181)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Bridge.deposit(uint8,bytes32,bytes) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1135-1150):
	External calls:
	- depositHandler.deposit(resourceID,destinationChainID,depositNonce,msg.sender,data) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1147)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deposit(destinationChainID,resourceID,depositNonce) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1149)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Bridge.depositETH(uint8,bytes32,bytes) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1160-1187):
	External calls:
	- wtokenAddress = IERCHandler(handler)._wtokenAddress() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1175)
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).deposit{value: value}() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1177)
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).transfer(address(handler),value) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1178)
	- depositHandler.deposit(resourceID,destinationChainID,depositNonce,msg.sender,data) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1184)
	External calls sending eth:
	- IWETH(wtokenAddress).deposit{value: value}() (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1177)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deposit(destinationChainID,resourceID,depositNonce) (../..0xa2a22b46b8df38cd7c55e6bf32ea5a32637cf2b1.sol#1186)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
